long_instructions.Function intro Ryan:
A **function** named `build bridge` is in your workspace.  All the code you need to cross the river is built in! \
 \
Snap the small, green block twice into your workspace to fix the path and get {currentPlayerName} to the Redstone Torch [redstone_torch].

long_instructions.MC_HOC_2017_01_RETRY:
{currentPlayerName} is trapped inside the house, but the Agent is here to help!   \
 \
   \
Snap a `move forwards` block onto the `when run` block in the workspace to get the Agent to the pressure plate [PressurePlate_Up], then press "Run" and use the arrow keys to move {currentPlayerName} out of the house to collect the **chest** [chest].

long_instructions.MC_HOC_2017_02_Cole:
{currentPlayerName} is off on an adventure! To help, get the **map** [map_empty] behind the locked door on the right. \
 \
Snap the code into the workspace to move the Agent to the pressure plate [PressurePlate_Up] so that {currentPlayerName} can get through.
